body.p:
Hustonville Ky
Lincoln County Ky
June 24 1862
Hon B Magofin Gov of Kentucky
Sir

We address you upon the subject of a Murder committed in Casey County Ky on the 4 day of April 1862 by one Edward L. F. Gill The murder was committed by said Gill by the killing of his own wife without cause or provocation, and then fled from Justice The community feel that there should be a reward offered by the Governor for his apprehension The relations of his wife are unable to offer a reward
Said Gill is abut 33 years of age weight about 160 pounds Sandy Hair very high cheek bone. & full over the eye about 5 feet 10 Inches high We hope to be delivered to Jailor Casey County
We hope you will offer a reward for him

Yours
John Coulter
J Z Carpenter

Casey Co
offer reward
$250 --
B M
July 7" 1862
